text: Luis Aldair Arroyo Cabeza (born 9 April 1996) is an Ecuadorian footballer who plays as a forward for Vysočina Jihlava. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |rowspan="2"|Třinec |2018–19 |rowspan="2"|Fortuna národní liga |8||3||0||0||0||0||8||3 |- |2019–20 |14||0||1Appearances in the Czech Cup||0||0||0||15||0 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !22!!3!!1!!0!!0!!0!!23!!3 |} ;Notes ==References== ==External links== Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Ecuadorian footballers Category:Ecuadorian expatriate footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Czech National Football League players Category:FK Fotbal Třinec players Category:Ecuadorian expatriate sportspeople in the Czech Republic Category:Expatriate footballers in the Czech Republic Category:FC Vysočina Jihlava players
title: Luis Arroyo (footballer)
